channel.title: Incident Investigation 🔎 🥷 on Analyst
channel.description: Recent content in Incident Investigation 🔎 🥷 on Analyst

item.title: 🐀 Threat Hunting And Intelligence
item.description: ATT&CK MITRE Cyber Analitics Repository - https://car.mitre.org/. That’s basically what I was planning to write in here, but it’s already implemented and in a very neat way.

item.title: 🗒 Incident Response Checklist
item.description: Preparation 📝 Compile a list of all your assets (servers, networks, applications etc) 📈 Rank them by level of importance.

item.title: 🗒️ Forensic Investigation Checklist
item.description: Identification/Assessment (aka Preparation) In short, understand your scope (technical and legal aspects), your goals and people you are going to work with.

item.title: ⏱️ Timelines And Timestamps
item.description: If something was downloaded and the accessed in several days - then the suspect knew about this file.
